DataSource.Query: WITH summary AS ( SELECT items.item_id, items.item_name, item_groups.item_group_name, string_agg(customers.customer_code || ': ' || (quotation_details.quantity:: float), ',') as customer_name, units.unit_id as base_unit_id, SUM(quotation_details.quantity) as base_total_quantity, units.unit_code FROM sales.quotations JOIN inventory.customers ON quotations.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN sales.quotation_details ON quotations.quotation_id = quotation_details.quotation_id JOIN inventory.items ON quotation_details.item_id = items.item_id JOIN inventory.units ON quotation_details.unit_id = units.unit_id JOIN inventory.item_groups ON item_groups.item_group_id = items.item_group_id WHERE quotations.office_id = @OfficeId and quotations.cancelled = false AND quotations.expected_delivery_date BETWEEN @From::date AND @To::date group by item_groups.item_group_name,items.item_name, units.unit_code,items.item_id, units.unit_id) SELECT row_number() over(order by item_group_name, item_name) as "Serial No", customer_name, item_group_name as "Category", inventory.get_item_name_by_item_id(item_id) AS item_name, sum(base_total_quantity) AS quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(base_unit_id) AS unit FROM summary group by item_group_name,customer_name, item_name,item_id, unit ORDER BY item_group_name, item_name;
